src:
Data dan Fakta Premier League: Watford vs Chelsea
01 Nov 2019, 16:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 4 Chelsea akan main tandang melawan tim juru kunci Watford pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Minggu (03/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Vicarage Road ini.
Dalam laga tandangnya melawan Watford di Premier League musim lalu, Chelsea menang 2-1 lewat sepasang gol Eden Hazard (1 penalti). Watford mencetak gol lewat Roberto Pereyra.
Selalu tercipta 3 gol atau lebih dalam 6 pertemuan terakhir Watford dan Chelsea di Premier League.
Chelsea baru kalah 2 kali dalam 12 pertemuan dengan Watford di Premier League (M8 S2 K2), dan semuanya mereka alami di kandang Watford, yakni 0-1 pada musim 1999/00 dan 1-4 pada musim 2017/18.
Chelsea cuma 1 kali clean sheet dalam 6 laga terakhirnya melawan Watford di Premier League, yakni ketika menang 3-0 di Stamford Bridge melalui gol-gol Ruben Loftus-Cheek, David Luiz, dan Gonzalo Higuain musim lalu.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Premier League Data and Facts: Watford vs Chelsea
Nov 01 2019, 16:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - 4th place Chelsea will play away against Watford caretaker team in Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/20, Sunday (03/11/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at Vicarage Road.
In their away game against Watford in the Premier League last season, Chelsea won 2-1 through a pair of goals from Eden Hazard (1 penalty). Watford scored through Roberto Pereyra.
Always created 3 or more goals in the last 6 meetings Watford and Chelsea in the Premier League.
Chelsea have only lost 2 times in 12 meetings with Watford in the Premier League (M8 S2 K2), and all of them experienced at home to Watford, namely 0-1 in the 1999/00 season and 1-4 in the 2017/18 season.
Chelsea have only had one clean sheet in their last 6 matches against Watford in the Premier League, when they won 3-0 at Stamford Bridge through the goals of Ruben Loftus-Cheek, David Luiz and Gonzalo Higuain last season.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
